name: "Ultimate Overlord's Mega Magic Sword"
description:
This card will record the number of Action Cards with different names you have played in this match whose names are not in your original deck for said match, with each type granting 1 Support.
If this card's Support value is at least 2/4/8, then the Character will deal +1/2/3 DMG.
descriptionraw: This card will record the number of Action Cards with different names you have played in this match whose names are not in your original deck for said match, with each type granting 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Support</color>.\nIf this card's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Support</color> value is at least 2/4/8, then the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character will deal +1/2/3 DMG</color>.
